item.title: Making certain characters forbidden?
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“DuhPk, post:27, topic:232955”]You can’t program either
Stop acting tough if you think your tough face me irl instead of over the internet[/quote]
Ok, How close do you live?
San Jose, California US is where I live.

[code]
import java.util.talker;
import java.util.server;

public class DuhPk extends IdioticMoparscapien {
public boolean coder = true;

public void code {
talker.sendMessage(“I am a coder and Anthony is smarter than me cause all I ever do is code shitty rpivate servers which don’t even follow proper code conventions.”);
server.code();
}
}[/code]
I didn’t bother following conventions, if I did you wouldn’t understand it.
